channel.title: Omega 525 - By Bando & Ecstasy of R-S
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=3][B][COLOR=RoyalBlue][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2d8j9mx.png[/img]
Why did you switch from 317 to 525?[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2][COLOR=RoyalBlue]We were thinking, and we've noticed that 317s just aren't much fun. We spend all of this time putting stuff into the client that makes it huge, and it always comes out buggy. People are trying to make their clients 474, but we've decided to go one step up and do the real thing. A 525. This gives us more opportunities to make better minigames, such as godwars, bounty hunter, etc. This will be based off of the 317 Project Omega, so we still have all of our content.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B][SIZE=5][SIZE=3]Introductory
[/SIZE][/SIZE][/B] Project Omega is a server in development created by Bando and myself that takes the aspects of runescape and makes it enjoyable. It is based on Hyperion, around the 525 revision. The difference between this server and others are, we - the creators make things to the best extent. The features will include PSI(player suggested ideas) as well as loved mini-games such as Pest-control, and Fight-caves, locations such as God-wars and warriors guild. So enjoy, and be patient for development to progress.[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2nap949.gif[/img] [COLOR=RoyalBlue][B][SIZE=3]About Project Omega[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=RoyalBlue]Project Omega is going to be a very adventurous and fun private server. We want players to feel like there is actually something to gain from playing for a long time. Project Omega will be based in five main cities.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Lunar isle[/B] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/52e3yf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/jphksl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xpzsr6.png[/img]
[B]Jatizo[/B] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2lmb1hz.png[/img]
[B]Nietiznot[/B] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14lq6ih.png[/img]
But those are just the main cities. We will have minor cities such as Lumbridge Karamja Canifis ...
We will have a number of quests for players to do, to keep themselves occupied while they can't PK, or maybe they just want to do quests? The quests I can think off of the top of my head that I know will be added are:
Desert Treasure Lunar Diplomacy
But we will also have some mini-quests and mini-games such as Godwars Bounty hunter Pest control Castle wars(Maybe) Recipe for disaster(For metal gloves)
However, Project Omega isn't just about skills, quests, minigames, and PKing... We also want to bring back the good old fashioned RuneScape prostitution.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15dph4z.png[/img][/COLOR]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B][SIZE=2]Monsters[/SIZE][/B] [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/mon2/Bronze_Dragon.gif[/img] There are several different monsters users can battle in Omega. This ranges from goblins, to tormented demons, to men, and so on! We plan to add enough monster-based minigames and such so players never get bored. [/COLOR]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Current features[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] [LEFT][B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Combat[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]Melee [list] [*]Most melee is finished. This includes every weapon, animation, timer, and hit etc. All we need left is special attacks which will be done soon [/list]
[*]Range [list] [*]Range has also been started. This includes all arrow types, all bow types, bonuses, etc. [/list]
[*]Player vs player [*]Player vs npc[/ul]
[B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]Stumps removing [list] [*]All stumps remove with their perfect positions [*]Timing algorithm [/list]
[*]Perfect axe animations, level reqs, etc. [*]A decent timing algorithm[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Thieving [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]All stalls work [*]Stall removing [list] [*]This works for every stall. We use a global object system to determine what the face of the stall is, so we can replace it. [/list]
[*]Failing/Succeeding algorithm[/ul]
[B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Cooking [/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]Near perfect to runescape burning algorithm [*]Every single fish ingame works [*]Runescape xp * 10 [*]Ranges give a lower chance of burning your food [*]Cooking gauntlets give a lower chance of burning your food[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]World-wide door system [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]Every door ingame works[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]King black dragon [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]All of the king black dragon's attacks work [*]Anti dragon-shield works[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Tormented Demons [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]Shields [*]Switching attacks [*]Switching prayers to whatever combat type you use[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Banking[/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]Searching [*]Noting [*]Taking out items [*]Putting in items [*]Re-arranging items[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Teleporting [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]All teleports work[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Clipped following[/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]For both npcs and players [*]This works for combat too[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Npc attacks [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]These are loaded through XML for ease of use [*]Very customizable[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B]Food [/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]All food works [*]All correct healing amounts [*]Perfect timers[/ul]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue][/COLOR][/LEFT] [COLOR=RoyalBlue] [B][SIZE=3]Support us [/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][SIZE=3][COLOR=RoyalBlue][SIZE=2]Please put one of these in your signature if you support this project!] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2d8j9mx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2ptt3lz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/xfst4x.png[/img]
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=RoyalBlue][SIZE=3][B]Ecstasy's updates
[/B][SIZE=2]Made it so you can't tell other users your password. No matter how hard you try. This is done server side and is for both private messaging, and normal chat.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/16gwpxz.png[/img] Hopefully this will keep our players accounts more secure, and stop a fair amount of account selling/trading.
I've currently removed the HP/Pray/Energy orbs, because I think that kind of ruins some parts of PKing. It makes it a lot funner if you have to risk taking time to switch tabs to check those out. Anyways, here's a picture. If people don't seem to like this update it will be removed. :p [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/rs7ll3.png[/img]
Thieving from stalls is just about done. This includes every single stall in ALL of runescape, with removing. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/r0axqg.gif[/img]
Woodcutting [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mhbzoi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vcvygy.jpg[/img]
Cooking finished [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=rsd2jc&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=rsd2jc&s=3[/url] [/SIZE][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE="6"][FONT="Impact"][U][B][COLOR="Blue"]Bando's Updates[/COLOR][/B][/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Project%20Omega/multiplayer.png[/img]
Headicons: [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Project%20Omega/Headicons.png[/img][/CENTER]
Magic: [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Project%20Omega/Untitled-1.gif[/img]
Curse magic spells: [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Project%20Omega/Magic-1.gif[/img]
Specials: [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Project%20Omega/DDS.gif[/img]

item.description:
@kidzz12 wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=3][B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]

Why did you switch from 317 to 525?[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]

[SIZE=2][COLOR=RoyalBlue]We were thinking, and we’ve noticed that 317s just aren’t much fun. We spend all of this time putting stuff into the client that makes it huge, and it always comes out buggy. People are trying to make their clients 474, but we’ve decided to go one step up and do the real thing. A 525. This gives us more opportunities to make better minigames, such as godwars, bounty hunter, etc. This will be based off of the 317 Project Omega, so we still have all of our content.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=RoyalBlue][B][SIZE=5][SIZE=3]Introductory

[/SIZE][/SIZE][/B] Project Omega is a server in development created by Bando and myself that takes the aspects of runescape and makes it enjoyable. It is based on Hyperion, around the 525 revision. The difference between this server and others are, we - the creators make things to the best extent. The features will include PSI(player suggested ideas) as well as loved mini-games such as Pest-control, and Fight-caves, locations such as God-wars and warriors guild. So enjoy, and be patient for development to progress.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=RoyalBlue][SIZE=3]About Project Omega[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=RoyalBlue]Project Omega is going to be a very adventurous and fun private server. We want players to feel like there is actually something to gain from playing for a long time. Project Omega will be based in five main cities.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=RoyalBlue]Lunar isle


Jatizo

Nietiznot

But those are just the main cities. We will have minor cities such as
Lumbridge
Karamja
Canifis
…

We will have a number of quests for players to do, to keep themselves occupied while they can’t PK, or maybe they just want to do quests?
The quests I can think off of the top of my head that I know will be added are:

Desert Treasure
Lunar Diplomacy

But we will also have some mini-quests and mini-games such as
Godwars
Bounty hunter
Pest control
Castle wars(Maybe)
Recipe for disaster(For metal gloves)

However, Project Omega isn’t just about skills, quests, minigames, and PKing… We also want to bring back the good old fashioned RuneScape prostitution.

[/COLOR]

[COLOR=RoyalBlue][SIZE=2]Monsters[/SIZE]

There are several different monsters users can battle in Omega. This ranges from goblins, to tormented demons, to men, and so on! We plan to add enough monster-based minigames and such so players never get bored.
[/COLOR]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Current features[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[]Most melee is finished. This includes every weapon, animation, timer, and hit etc. All we need left is special attacks which will be done soon

Hopefully this will keep our players accounts more secure, and stop a fair amount of account selling/trading.

I’ve currently removed the HP/Pray/Energy orbs, because I think that kind of ruins some parts of PKing. It makes it a lot funner if you have to risk taking time to switch tabs to check those out. Anyways, here’s a picture. If people don’t seem to like this update it will be removed.
